shipDescription: Get ready to sail on one of the most exciting ships on the seas! Norwegian Escape is ready to whisk you away. Get ready to chase sunsets on The Waterfront. Sip on some of Napa's best blends at The cellars, A Michael Mondavi Family Wine Bar. Or try our unique specialty hand-crafted cocktails. Be dazzled by Broadway hits like After Midnight. Discover a new world of freedom and flexibility on Norwegian Escape.
shipDescriptionHtml: Get ready to sail on one of the most exciting ships on the seas! Norwegian Escape is ready to whisk you away to The Caribbean from Miami and Orlando, Canada & New England and Bermuda from New York, and the Mediterranean and Northern Europe from London, Rome or Berlin. Indulging in every whim is what unforgettable vacations are made of. Get ready to chase sunsets on The Waterfront. Sip on some of Napa's best blends at The cellars, A Michael Mondavi Family Wine Bar. Or try our unique specialty hand-crafted cocktails. Be dazzled by Broadway hits like After Midnight. Discover a new world of freedom and flexibility on Norwegian Escape.
name: Norwegian Escape

stateroomSubMetas.guaranteeMessage:
What is a Guarantee?

A Guarantee Stateroom has no cabin number assigned at the time of booking. You are guaranteed to sail in the category you have chosen, or higher.

If you have specific requirements, for example proximity to elevators or window type, a Guarantee is not recommended.

When will you know your stateroom number?

Any time after final payment has been received and up to the day of sailing.

Why pick a Guarantee?

  • You have a chance of being upgraded to a higher category!
  • You will never get a lower category. For example, if you choose the Oceanview Guarantee you will always get an Oceanview or higher.
  • You might end up staying in a location you never considered. The deck and location of a Guarantee Stateroom can be anywhere on the ship.

stateroomSubMetas.guaranteeMessage:
What is a Guarantee?

A Guarantee Stateroom has no cabin number assigned at the time of booking. You are guaranteed to sail in the category you have chosen, or higher.

If you have specific requirements, for example proximity to elevators or window type, a Guarantee is not recommended.

When will you know your stateroom number?

Any time after final payment has been received and up to the day of sailing.

Why pick a Guarantee?

  • You have a chance of being upgraded to a higher category!
  • You will never get a lower category. For example, if you choose the Oceanview Guarantee you will always get an Oceanview or higher.
  • You might end up staying in a location you never considered. The deck and location of a Guarantee Stateroom can be anywhere on the ship.

stateroomSubMetas.guaranteeMessage:
What is a Guarantee?

A Guarantee Stateroom has no cabin number assigned at the time of booking. You are guaranteed to sail in the category you have chosen, or higher.

If you have specific requirements, for example proximity to elevators or window type, a Guarantee is not recommended.

When will you know your stateroom number?

Any time after final payment has been received and up to the day of sailing.

Why pick a Guarantee?

  • You have a chance of being upgraded to a higher category!
  • You will never get a lower category. For example, if you choose the Oceanview Guarantee you will always get an Oceanview or higher.
  • You might end up staying in a location you never considered. The deck and location of a Guarantee Stateroom can be anywhere on the ship.

stateroomSubMetas.guaranteeMessage:
What is a Guarantee?

A Guarantee Stateroom has no cabin number assigned at the time of booking. You are guaranteed to sail in the category you have chosen, or higher.

If you have specific requirements, for example proximity to elevators or window type, a Guarantee is not recommended.

When will you know your stateroom number?

Any time after final payment has been received and up to the day of sailing.

Why pick a Guarantee?

  • You have a chance of being upgraded to a higher category!
  • You will never get a lower category. For example, if you choose the Oceanview Guarantee you will always get an Oceanview or higher.
  • You might end up staying in a location you never considered. The deck and location of a Guarantee Stateroom can be anywhere on the ship.

stateroomSubMetas.name: Family Inside
stateroomSubMetas.description: Choose an upper deck 12, 13 or 14 and decide front of ship or rear. These intimate staterooms sleep up to four, making them an affordable family option. Plus some can connect.
stateroomSubMetas.body: Many sleep better than ever in these cozy yet comfy, interior, upper deck staterooms. Plus some can connect so family and friends can spread out yet stay together. stateroomMetas.name: Studio
stateroomMetas.description: Specifically designed and priced for solo travelers, our Studios feature a full-size bed, separate bath area and access to the private Studio Lounge — no single supplement required.
stateroomMetas.shortDescription: Ideal for the solo traveler, featuring everything you to need to refresh, recharge and get back to the action on board.
includedFeatures: Key-card access to the Studio Lounge
imagePath: sites/default/files/MI.METAS_.ESCAPE.STUDIO_590x287_2.jpg||Affordable style and comfort for solo travelers.
sites/default/files/ncl.escape.sololounge072616.jpg||Meet your neighbors in the Studio Lounge
stateroomMetas.features_highlights: Our Studios feature private key-card access, full-size bed, one-way window to the corridor, separate areas for bathroom, sink and shower, and access to private Studio Lounge.
stateroomMetas.featureHighlights: Our Studios feature private key-card access, full-size bed, one-way window to the corridor, separate areas for bathroom, sink and shower, and access to private Studio Lounge.

stateroomSubMetas.name: Studio
stateroomSubMetas.description: Cool and hip, our studios have just what you need. Plus enjoy access to the private Studio Lounge, a great place to meet your neighbors for a pre-dinner drink. Some can connect with other Studios.
stateroomSubMetas.body: Private keycard access complex comprised of staterooms specifically designed and priced for the solo traveler. Featuring a full-size bed, a one-way window to the corridor, and separate areas for your bathroom, sink and shower, in 100 square feet of living space. Includes access to the private Studio Lounge. Plus, some Studios can connect to each other so you can stay close yet still enjoy your privacy. No single supplement required.
stateroomSubMetas.featuresAndHighlights: Private keycard access, shared private lounge, full-size bed, and separate areas for bathroom, sink and shower.
stateroomSubMetas.marketingTagLine: Enjoy the exclusive Studio Lounge, a hangout spot just for  Studio guests. Some can connect.
